docs.snippet: The latest developments from the annual meeting of the United Nations General Assembly, where world leaders are grappling with a multitude of global crises, including the fight against terrorism — the Islamic State in particular — and ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The latest developments from the annual meeting of the United Nations General Assembly, where world leaders are grappling with a multitude of global crises, including the fight against terrorism — the Islamic State in particular — and easing the refugee crisis in the Middle East and North Africa (all times local):

headline.main: The Latest: North Korea's FM Presses US for Peace Treaty
headline.print_headline: The Latest: North Korea's FM Presses US for Peace Treaty

docs.snippet: Donald Trump says he will send Syrian refugees home if he's elected president, but U.S. laws would interfere with his plans....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump says he will send Syrian refugees home if he's elected president, but U.S. laws would interfere with his plans.
